main.name: Areeb Vohra
main.description: I like dabbling in various parts of frontend and backend development and like to explore new technological innovations in the software world.  I have developed a portfolio of applications on different platforms including react native and flutter.
main.bio: Graduated from Hamdard University with a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science. Have Experience in Android/IOS (Hybrid) and Web Application Development using the Latest technologies like Flutter, React Native, React.js, MongoDB and Firebase.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: Bachelor's of Science in Computer Science

testimonials.text: Very fun to work with - great with revisions - and the function is super clean coding. Thanks!

Areebvohra did a great job working on website for a real estate agent. He was able to completely design custom Wordpress site that looked and functioned like another site that we had liked. If you need custom Wordpress website design then he is the guy you should use.
Very good, patient and very professional! Will use him again for other websites. Highly recommended!
